text: for the longest time I denied that I add
mental illness I thought that everybody
had the same scary and violent and
confusing thoughts they were just better
at masking it so I was socially
maladroit versus mentally ill and then I
I got him a particular drug which
cleared my mind and I started thinking
well you know maybe the rest of the
population has a fair amount like that
idea one point was that it took a long
time i spent about 10 years on and off
medication trying to prove I wasn't men
LOL once I got on medication
consistently and stayed in therapy
consistently my life got much better
it's the illness became kind of accident
wrong with innocence and again it became
it defined me less paradoxically the
more I accepted it was I don't think of
myself as a schizophrenic I think of
myself as someone who has schizophrenia
sometimes it acts up I have to watch it
I have to worry about it but it doesn't
dominate or control my life anymore
